sourcesContent:
<template>
    <router-view />
</template>
<script setup>



const debounce = (fn, delay) => {
    let timer
    return (...args) => {
        if (timer) {
            clearTimeout(timer)
        }
        timer = setTimeout(() => {
            fn(...args)
        }, delay)
    }
}

const _ResizeObserver = window.ResizeObserver;
window.ResizeObserver = class ResizeObserver extends _ResizeObserver {
    constructor(callback) {
        callback = debounce(callback, 200);
        super(callback);
    }
}
</script>
<style>
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 0 !important;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 0 !important;
    height: 0;
}

body {
    overflow: hidden;
}
</style>
